languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс с мрачной физиономией едва заметно пожимает плечами, словно произнося "Я же предупреждал".{/n}
{n}His face grim, Heinrix gives an almost imperceptible shrug as if to say, 'I warned you.'"{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс с мрачной физиономией едва заметно пожимает плечами, словно произнося "Я же предупреждал".{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}His face grim, Heinrix gives an almost imperceptible shrug as if to say, 'I warned you.'"{/n}
{n}His face grim, Heinrix gives an almost imperceptible shrug as if to say, 'I warned you.'"{/n}
{n}His face grim, Heinrix gives an almost imperceptible shrug as if to say, 'I warned you.'"{/n}
{n}His face grim, Heinrix gives an almost imperceptible shrug as if to say, 'I warned you.'"{/n}

languages.text: {n}大审判官脸色阴沉。海因里希几乎难以察觉地耸了耸肩，像是在说：“我早就警告过你。”{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His face grim, Heinrix gives an almost imperceptible shrug as if to say, 'I warned you.'"{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长脸色阴沉。海因里希几乎难以察觉地耸了耸肩，像是在说：“我早就警告过你。”{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con rostro sombrío, Heinrix se encoge de hombros casi imperceptiblemente, como si dijera «Ya se lo había advertido».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His face grim, Heinrix gives an almost imperceptible shrug as if to say, 'I warned you.'"{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con rostro sombrío, Heinrix se encoge de hombros casi imperceptiblemente, como si dijera «Ya se lo había advertido».{/n}

languages.text: {n}険しい表情のハインリックスは、「俺は警告したぞ」と言わんばかりの調子でほんの少し肩をすくめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His face grim, Heinrix gives an almost imperceptible shrug as if to say, 'I warned you.'"{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}険しい表情のハインリックスは、「俺は警告したぞ」と言わんばかりの調子でほんの少し肩をすくめる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mit grimmigem Gesicht zuckt Heinrix fast unmerklich mit den Schultern, als wolle er sagen: "Ich habe Euch gewarnt."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His face grim, Heinrix gives an almost imperceptible shrug as if to say, 'I warned you.'"{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit grimmigem Gesicht zuckt Heinrix fast unmerklich mit den Schultern, als wolle er sagen: "Ich habe Euch gewarnt."{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'air sinistre, Heinrix hausse les épaules de manière presque imperceptible, comme pour dire « Je vous avais {mf|prévenu|prévenue}. »{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His face grim, Heinrix gives an almost imperceptible shrug as if to say, 'I warned you.'"{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'air sinistre, Heinrix hausse les épaules de manière presque imperceptible, comme pour dire « Je vous avais {mf|prévenu|prévenue}. »{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yüzüne katı bir ifade oturmuş olan Heinrix, belli belirsiz omuz silkiyor. Âdeta 'seni uyarmıştım' diyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His face grim, Heinrix gives an almost imperceptible shrug as if to say, 'I warned you.'"{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzüne katı bir ifade oturmuş olan Heinrix belli belirsiz omuz silkiyor. Âdeta 'seni uyarmıştım' der gibi.{/n}
